messages.subject: Marianne
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Marianne, Thanks,  I only have a long day with no planned other contact once or twice a week.  I do have my own business but it can t be done much during
messages.messageBody:
Hi Marianne,

Thanks, I only have a long day with no planned other contact once or
twice a week. I do have my own business but it can't be done much
during the day. We volunteer at an animal shelter once a week (but that
is mostly for my son). It's clear we need to structure time for me
during the day as well as my son. I may figure out how I can structure
more time for my business. I do have times that I need for day
appointments and I have a friend who could take him then. I also enjoy
doing art which I may provide more time for.

Sherry
